missionBanner.title: Safar was born from a real need

desktop.description: For a long time I wanted to travel but didn't want to do it alone. I searched for communities and platforms, but none combined compatibility, clarity and organization in one place. That's why I created Safar: a space where like-minded people meet and turn ideas into real trips. With private groups, chat and simple tools, planning stops being chaos and starting becomes easy.

mobile.descriptionPart1: I wanted to travel, but not alone. I tried communities and apps: compatibility, clarity and order were missing.
mobile.descriptionPart2: That's why I created Safar: it connects like-minded people and turns ideas into real trips with private groups, chat and simple tools.

mission.title: Why do I want to create Safar?
mission.intro: I don't want anyone to miss out on traveling because they don't have someone to do it with. Loneliness is difficult, there are many types of loneliness and it's hard. With this project I want to help a bit with that.

aboutMe.title: Let's talk a bit about me
aboutMe.content:
I just went through a complicated stage. Seeing the reality of other people is complicated and expressing it is even more difficult.

I have to acknowledge that I feel alone. I have friends but many have commitments, partners, children, are working abroad or others have even evolved differently and we've lost contact. They say that the people you share X% of your life with are your coworkers, well I work remotely and most of them live outside where I live.

I don't mean to complain or play the victim, there are worse things and I'm in a very good situation.

Those who know me know that I've always wanted to build something, something that adds a bit of value, that helps people.

A few weeks ago I was at a company event in Madrid, in person, and in a conversation with my manager he told me
aboutMe.quote: "well, on Friday I'm going to Vienna with my partner, do you have any trips planned?"
aboutMe.contentAfterQuote:
- Well, the truth is no, I'd like to but I don't want to do it alone

Traveling alone is not bad. There are those who love it and see its advantages but it's not for me. I deeply admire those who do it

On the way home I said what if I create a platform to find travel companions

theIdea.title: The idea
theIdea.content:
A place where you can find like-minded people and organize trips without complications. Where everyone can propose, edit itineraries, divide tasks... and the plan actually happens

I want to make it easier to organize the trip

using AI to create an itinerary
theIdea.launchDate: My intention is to launch it by mid-January 2026

launchDate.question: When will Safar launch?
launchDate.answer: We are in the validation phase. If the reception is positive, our goal is to launch in early 2026 (first quarter). We will notify the waiting list in order of registration.

projectGoal.question: What is the project's goal?
projectGoal.answer: The project's goal is to be able to travel with a group of people. We want anyone to have a space where they can organize their trip and find people to travel with if they wish. There are people who feel lonely or don't have anyone to travel with.

plansAndPricing.question: Plans and pricing
plansAndPricing.answer: Plans may be adjusted at launch. The first 50 will get lifetime premium features and early access to new features. We will announce any changes transparently before they take effect.

verification.question: How will we verify the first 50 users?
verification.answer: We will contact them before launching the application and speak with them through the provided social network. If there is no response, we will move to the next person until we fill that quota.

suggestions.question: Suggestions and new features
suggestions.answer: Write to us at itsjesusmacias@gmail.com with the subject "SAFAR: [your topic]". We read all proposals and prioritize the most requested ones. Thank you for helping us build Safar.

section1.title: 1. Information we collect
section1.content: At SAFAR, we currently only request your social network information (Instagram, TikTok or Email) to contact you during the beta phase of the project.

section2.title: 2. Use of information
section2.content: Your social network information will be used exclusively to contact you and communicate with you about the launch of SAFAR and to verify your registration in the beta program.

section3.title: 3. Data protection
section3.content: We are committed to protecting your personal information. We will not share, sell or disclose your social network information to third parties without your explicit consent.

section4.title: 4. Your rights
section4.content: You have the right to request access, rectification or deletion of your personal information at any time. You can contact us at itsjesusmacias@gmail.com.

section5.title: 5. Changes to this policy
section5.content: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy. We will notify you of any relevant changes through the contact information you have provided to us.
